revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A historical & philosophical sketch of the discoveries & settlements of the Europeans in northern & western Africa, at the close of the eighteenth century, by John..."
revision.text: Possibly: A historical & philosophical sketch of the discoveries & settlements of the Europeans in northern & western Africa, at the close of the eighteenth century, by John Leyden. (Edinburgh : printed by J. Moir, Paterson's Court, for T. Brown, no. 1 North Bridge-Street, and J. Symington, Parliament-Square, and Vernor & Hood, London, 1799). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2439695~S1
